expected-result.ddl: drop table if exists prod; create table prod \( id integer\({0}\) not null, name char\({1}\), primary key \( id \) \); drop table if exists prod_detail; create table prod_detail \( id integer\({0}\) not null, prod_id integer\({0}\), name char\({1}\), primary key \( id \) \);
alter table prod_detail add constraint prod_detail_product foreign key prod_detail_product \(prod_id \) references prod \(id \) ;
